titles.title: FUTURE Networks Act

Future Uses of Technology Upholding Reliable and Enhanced Networks Act
FUTURE Networks Act
Future Uses of Technology Upholding Reliable and Enhanced Networks Act
FUTURE Networks Act
To direct the Federal Communications Commission to establish a task force to be known as the "6G Task Force", and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held
Ordered to be Reported by Voice Vote.
Reported by the Committee on Energy and Commerce. H. Rept. 119-74.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 51.

action.text: Mr. Bilirakis moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.R. 2449.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

committee.name: House Energy and Commerce
committee.activity: Reported By, Markup By, Referred To
